channel.title: ★ Shiesty ★ VPS ★ PKers Paradise ★ Login & PK ★ Targets ★ Curses ★ Stable ★
channel.description:
[SIZE=2][B][U]Are you tired of searching for a decent PK server that actually has good quality? Well stop searching, you've reached your destination!
This server is mainly for PKers, but we do offer a Max Cape for our Skillers!
This server's system is very good especially for hybridding!
If you like to pk flawlessly without any delays/lag, I HIGHLY suggest you come check us out.
This is a PARTIAL spawn server. Some items are obtainable from the Wilderness/Player vs Monster[/U][/B][/SIZE]
[FONT=Arial Black][SIZE=5][B]Features[/B][/SIZE][/FONT]
[CODE]Better combat system
Hitsplats
Perfect server for PKers
Combat sound system (EG - Special attack sound effects, magic spells, etc)
Music Unlock system
Bounty Hunter System
PvMing
Max Cape
Flawless switches for hybrids
VPS Hosted (No delay/lag)
Automated Vote System[/CODE]
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[U][SIZE=2][I]Media so thread doesn't get reported . . Client link at the end of this post[/I][/SIZE][/U]
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

item.title: ★ Shiesty ★ VPS ★ PKers Paradise ★ Login & PK ★ Targets ★ Curses ★ Stable ★
item.dc:creator: @ZamFyy ZamFyy
item.description:
@ZamFyy wrote:

[quote=“Welliton_inc, post:6, topic:550871”][quote author=nolan2131 link=topic=669784.msg4478810#msg4478810 date=1428121737]
Mmmm, that OP Donator Store.
[/quote]

Yes that is right. You should maybe remove some items from your donator store and add them into your pkp store instead ( so it doesn’t seem like it’s P2W).[/quote]

Thanks for the idea.
Most items like nex sets and the weapons are obtainable from PvM.
The only thing that isn’t obtainable in-game and you must pay for are the cosmetics (Partyhat, h’ween)

Read full topic

item.description:
@ZamFyy wrote:

Welliton_inc:

Do you get any unspawnable items from corp beast?

You get sigils from corp beast.

So yes, you get unspawnables, which would be spirit shields.
